sentences.en: Browse the  technology bookstore for books on this and other technical topics.
sentences.cn: 在  技术书店 浏览关于这些和其他技术主题的图书。

sentences.en: Browse the technology bookstore for books on this and other technical topics.
sentences.cn: 在技术书店浏览关于这些和其他技术主题的图书。

sentences.en: Follow this road to the bookstore, then turn to the left.
sentences.cn: 顺着这条街到书店, 然后向左拐.

sentences.en: He carried on a bookstore in the town.
sentences.cn: 他在城里开了一家书店.

sentences.en: He enquired for the book in a bookstore.
sentences.cn: 他在书店查询那本书.

sentences.en: He happened on the book in a secondhand bookstore.
sentences.cn: 他在旧书店里偶然发现了这本书.

sentences.en: He lit upon some jest books in the bookstore.
sentences.cn: 他在书店偶然发现了一些笑话集。

sentences.en: He never goes out but he drops in at that bookstore.
sentences.cn: 他每次外出都会顺道去那家书店待一会儿.

sentences.en: I fell in with him at a bookstore in Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 我在上海的一家书店里碰到了他.

sentences.en: I happened to see Peter on the way to the bookstore yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天我去书店的路上碰巧遇见了彼得.

sentences.en: I like to go bookstore on my spare time.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢在我的业余时间去书店。

sentences.en: I ordered some new books from the bookstore.
sentences.cn: 我从书店订购了一些新书.

sentences.en: I picked up the book in a secondhand bookstore.
sentences.cn: 我在一家旧书店里偶获此书.

sentences.en: I tumbled upon the rare volume in the nearby bookstore.
sentences.cn: 我在附近那家书店偶然发现了这一珍本.

sentences.en: That bookstore would not accept returns even ones in good condition.
sentences.cn: 那家书店不接受退还的书,即使是完好无损的书也不要.

sentences.en: The books in the bookstore cover everything, from cookery to cytology.
sentences.cn: 那家书店从烹饪到细胞学各个方面的书都有。

sentences.en: The bookstore is just around the corner.
sentences.cn: 书店就在那边转弯的地方.

sentences.en: The technology bookstore: Browse for books on these and other technical topics.
sentences.cn: 技术书店：浏览关于这些主题和其他技术主题的图书。

sentences.en: Unable to find the book in this bookstore, he bought elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 这家书店找不到此书, 他到别处买去了.

sentences.en: Who returns home I pass by a bookstore on the road.
sentences.cn: 回家的路上我路过一家书店.

sentences.en: You can find these books in any local bookstore.
sentences.cn: 你在当地的任一所书店都能找到此类书。
